content:
mens golf team beat the 36hole Carleton scoring record at  while finished third at the Minnesota Womens Collegiate Golf Associations State Championship this past weekend PERIOD

The results from the weekend pushed the Knights up to seventeenth in the most recent World Golf Poll PERIOD This is the fourth time the Knights have appeared in the poll and highest ranking they have ever achieved in school history PERIOD In addition to the Knights MIAC powerhouses the University of St PERIOD Thomas and Gustavus are second and third in the nation respectively PERIOD The Knights should be moving up in the polls soon with a strong third place performance at the MWCGA State Championships which didnt factor into their current ranking PERIOD During the State Championships Knights standouts Katrina Wood  band Laura Knutson  tied for sixth place going 15over par  PERIOD Coach Eric Sieger was named coach of the year at the event PERIOD The Knights will finished off their season at the BluGold Spring Invitational this weekend in Eau Claire Wisconsin PERIOD

title: Women’s golf sets school record, moves up in the World Golf Poll rankings – The Carletonian
name: Carleton College
